Title: Carry forward the cause and forge ahead into the future, surge ahead in unity, strive to realize a comprehensive, relatively well-off society
Notes: Poster published on the occasion of the 18th CCP Congress, November 2012. At this congress, Xi Jinping succeeded Hu Jintao. The other members of the Politburo Standing Committee elected were Li Keqiang, Zhang Dejiang, Yu Zhengsheng, Liu Yunshan, Wang Qishan and Zhang Gaoli.
Tags: National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party
中国共产党全国代表大会
